Body:
pattern = ci_pattern.CIPatternUniform(normalization=1.0, regions=[(1, 4, 0, 3)]
    )
frame = ci_frame.ChInj(frame_geometry=ci_frame.FrameGeometry.
    euclid_bottom_left(), ci_pattern=pattern)
mask = ci_mask.CIMask.masked_parallel_trails_from_ci_frame(shape=(10, 3),
    ci_frame=frame, rows=(0, 4))
assert type(mask) == ci_mask.CIMask
assert (mask == np.array([[False, False, False], [False, False, False], [
    False, False, False], [False, False, False], [True, True, True], [True,
    True, True], [True, True, True], [True, True, True], [False, False, 
    False], [False, False, False]])).all()
